name: Twitter Trackbacks Bar
author: Alecsy

sections.description: Twitter Trackbacks Bar is plugin to integrate tweets that mention your post into your blog. It separates the trackbacks and the pings of comments. Each tweet is comes with reply and retweet’s links to get more readers engaged in your conversation’s story. This plugin must be installed with WordPress’s plugin Topsy, that integrate your tweets in comments in your blog.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload twitter_trackback to the `/wp-content/plugins/twitter_trackback
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Twitter TrackBacks Bar’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog: 1.0.1 : Bug with the folder’s name 1.0 : First stable version
